attributes.action: Save the Adur Special Needs Project from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adur Special Needs Project (ASP) has been providing respite care for children and young people with a range of sensory, mobility and behavioral difficulties in the Sussex area. ASP has been at the heart of its community for the last 18 years and has become a vital lifeline for many families who need support and respite. Most importantly we provides a safe, supportive and fun environment for the children and young people who use the project.  Please sign our petition to support this well needed charity (charity no: 1088423) from closure. Thank you.
